title: When the final section of I 140 opens to traffic will the entire stretch of the bypass from US 17 North to US 17 South carry the Interstate 140 designation? Currently the sections from I 40 to US17 in northern New Hanover and the section from US 74/76 to US 17 in Brunswick County have not been upgraded to full interstate standards and carry US 17 designations.  Will that change?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/01/why-do-signs-on-u-s-17-indicate-140-is-a-state-road-and-not-an-interstate-highway/ It will be labeled Interstate 140 throughout when the bypass is complete.
